Package com.pathfinder.racetrack.controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
com.pathfinder.racetrack.model.GameEngine
Direct Known Subclasses:
BobbyCarEngine, FormulaOneEngine, GoKartEngine
public abstract class GameEngine
extends Object
Contains the logic and rules of the game

      track - Where the game is carried

    • GameEngine

      public GameEngine​(RTSaveFile rtSaveFile) throws FileNotFoundException, NotAValidTrackException
      Initialise the game from a rtSave file
      Parameters:
      rtSaveFile - Location of the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - When the rtSave file was not found
      NotAValidTrackException - When the track was not valid
